page.title: 10INDUSTRY IN BROMPTON
page.content: Surrounded by the fertile farming land of the Vale of York,Brompton's major concern is farming and agriculturally allied industries such as farm building erectors,bulk milk collectors and dairy suppliers.The remaining industry is centred on a converted, disused,linen mill,around which the settlement developed.The small units are service industries e.g.a local merchants,car maintenance and repair garages,scrap metal dealer and a domestic electrician.The commercial industry of Brompton is dispersed through a selection of small shops:_2 general dealers,a Post Office,a bakery,a newsagents,a hairdressers and a take_away fish and chip shop.Holiday and leisure are served through the services of 4 public houses,catering with a selection of meals and thus providing another small industry.
